what: Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes — CalculateWangSimilarity
title: Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes — CalculateWangSimilarity
text: Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity group genes described James Z. Wang, Zhidian Du, Rapeeporn Payattakool, Philip S. Yu, Chin-Fu Chen, new method measure semantic similarity GO terms, Bioinformatics, Volume 23, Issue 10, 15 May 2007, Pages 1274–1281, https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btm087

title: Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes — CalculateWangSimilarity
code: CalculateWangSimilarity(   OrgDb,   keytype = "ENTREZID",   ont = "BP",   genes = NULL,   dropCodes = NULL,   minIC = NULL )

title: Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes — CalculateWangSimilarity
text: OrgDb OrgDb object keytype keytype select records OrgDb. possible keys returned using keys method. ont Type ontology used. One 'BP', 'MF', 'CC'. Defaults BP. genes List genes calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity . Defaults NULL (use annotated genes) dropCodes List codes annotation evidence types. Annotations codes dropped calculating similiarity. Defaults NULL, including annotations. minIC Minimum term information content 'IC' take account. Terms less IC used calculations. Defaults NULL

title: Calculate pairwise Wang semantic similarity between a group of genes — CalculateWangSimilarity
